full_summary:
===============

Government of Canada
Tender Notice
===============

**Janitorial Services for Canadian Forces Base Trenton**

*   **Tender Title:** 
    *   English: Janitorial Services CFB Trenton
    *   French: Services de conciergerie – BFC Trenton
*   **Reference Number:** WS4617413825
*   **Amendment Number:** 4
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4617413825
*   **Publication Date:** June 14, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** July 19, 2024, at 14:00 EDT
*   **Amendment Date:** July 16, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** September 30, 2027

Previous opportunities for this tender have been closed. This tender notice is specially called for general building and office cleaning and maintenance services for the Canadian Forces Base Trenton, Ontario. Bidders are responsible for offering their bids electronically via online tendering tools on the federal contracting site (Ariba Discovery).

Key Requirements:

*   General building and office cleaning and maintenance services
*   Building cleaning services
*   Window or window blind cleaning services
*   Building component cleaning services
*   Floor waxing or carpet cleaning

Eligible Provinces:

*   Ontario (except National Capital Region)
*   Canada

The procurement is managed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

Required supportive documents and bid submissions must be submitted by the deadline at 14:00 EDT. Failure to submit by this deadline may result in the bidder being declared non-responsive.

Additional Information is available through the online tendering tool (Ariba Discovery). Should you have specific questions, please reach out to Jessica Canas, (elle-la/she-her) at [jessica.canus@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canus@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

Online URL for bidding opportunity is [https://discovery.ariba.com](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20024122? extsite=MjAwMjQxMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Kindly follow these guidelines by clicking this link.
